ing: 1 (4.5 ounce) can solid white albacore tuna in water, drained
4 ounces pineapple tidbits with juice (such as DoleÂ®)
n: Robo's Lo-Cal Tuna, Pineapple, Cottage Cheese, and Basil Salad
des: "I've been mixing tuna with my cottage cheese at lunch for years and I've also enjoyed pairing fresh basil with pineapple. One day, I put it all together and came up with this recipe. Sometimes, I eat it in a bowl, sometimes with crackers, or bread, but anyway it's eaten, it hits all the high notes and is wonderfully satisfying."
ins: Stir tuna, cottage cheese, pineapple, basil, and salt together in a bowl.
